tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Gautami was super friendly. She made my child very comfortable  during the entire session, in fact he was really enjoying the air washing procedure as she had given him a few chances to try it out by himself under her supervision. She engaged him during the entire procedure by giving a small mirror to him so that he can see the procedure and give opinions on where actually he wanted the cleaning. It was really fun watching the scene actually. I felt so relieved watching him co-operating with the procedure, kudos to Dr.
I must say, the search of a good paediatric dentist ended at Tooth Story.
Thank you Dr Gautami for giving my son  a good dental experience.
In addition, thanks to both the supportive staffs who were very polite and well mannered and made the overall experience a magical one.
Definitely a highly recommended dental clinic.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words. It was an absolute pleasure spending time and treating Snithik. We look forward to seeing him at his follow up visits. Regards!

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Kids will always be kids, and so Dr. Gautami also becomes kids with them. She creates a very happy and friendly environment before starting any treatment which makes very easy for parents to handle their children with any sort of treatment. She is great in her work.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words.

review: **** ******* **** * Being a childrens dentistry, all necessary amenities are well provided   , a lively clinic with tons of soft toys lined up , the much needed distraction in the form of playing cartoons and songs , keeps the little patient happily occupied , rather than unhappy and anxious .** ******* ** **** ************ *** swift handed and treatment is smooth  . All in all , a great experience.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words, we are glad your child had a wonderful experience with us.

Dr. Gautami's clinic is now his favorite place..

review:
Dr Gautami is a godsend. She is very patient with kids who genuinely cares about her patients. She always takes the time to explain things to us in terms that we can understand. She is very diligent with kids and makes sure that they have a smooth dental treatment.The entire staff is wonderful. I would recommend Dr.Gautami to anyone seeking a kind, compassionate, and brilliant doctor for their kids dentistry.
Regards,
Mausami
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words. We are glad that the children were comfortable and had a positive dental experience.
